actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the transfer of jurisdiction of certain lands in the National Park System located in Montgomery County, Md., and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to transfer to the Secretary of the Army jurisdiction of specified lands in the National Park System located in Montgomery County, Maryland.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the transfer of jurisdiction of certain lands in the National Park System located in Montgomery County, Md., and for other purposes.
